bean.p:instructionalText: Note: If an incoming record matches with more than one existing record, the incoming record will be discarded.
bean.p:render: @{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'Bib Import' or document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'GOKB Import' or document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'Batch Delete'}

@{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'Bib Import' or document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'GOKB Import' or document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'Batch Delete'}

bean.p:value: Do not perform matching of incoming Bib with existing Bibs.
Perform matching of incoming Bib with existing Bibs.

bean.p:label: If incoming Bib does not match with any existing Bibs
If incoming Bib matches with existing Bib

bean.p:value: Overlay existing Bib with incoming Bib.
Do not perform matching of Holdings.
Delete all existing Holdings and Items, and add incoming Holdings and Items.
Keep all existing Holdings and Items, and add incoming Holdings and Items.

bean.p:messageText: [b]If an incoming Holdings does not match with any existing Holdings[/b]

bean.p:value: Discard incoming Holdings and its Items.

bean.p:messageText: [b]If an incoming Holdings matches with any existing Holdings[/b]

bean.p:value: Overlay existing Holdings with incoming Holdings.
Do not perform matching of Items.
Delete all existing Items and, add incoming Items.
Keep all existing Items and, add incoming Items.

bean.p:label: If incoming Item does not match with any existing Items.
If incoming Item match with an existing Items.

bean.p:value: Overlay existing Items with Incoming Items.

bean.p:label: If there is a match perform this operation
If there is no match perform this operation

bean.p:defaultValue: * If multiple matches found the incoming record is rejected and an error is reported

bean.p:value: Delete all existing instances and add new incoming ones
Keep all existing instances and add new incoming ones
Keep all existing instances and do not add new incoming ones

bean.p:label: For new records set Bib status as
For new Bib set Staff Only
For new Holdings set Staff Only
For new Item set Staff Only
For Overlaid Bib set Staff Only

property.name: instructionalText
property.value: Note : A filter field can be specified in one of two ways:[br]1. Selecting an option from the drop-down "Select Field Name".[br]2. Entering a MARC field like in the text box "Enter Field Name" : e.g. 001, 245 $a, 245 $a$b, 245 ## $a, 245 04 $a, 245 ## $a$b

bean.p:render: @{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'Batch Export' or document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'Bib Import' or document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'GOKB Import' or document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'Order Record Import' or document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.batchProcessProfileType eq 'Invoice Import'}

property.name: instructionalText
property.value: Note : For Bibmarc datatype the field value can be like 001, 245 $a, 245 $a$b, 245 ## $a, 245 04 $a, 245 ## $a$b
